scripts.dev: concurrently -n " server , client " -c "yellow.bold,green.bold" "cd server && yarn dev" "cd client && yarn dev"
scripts.build: concurrently -n " server , client " -c "yellow.bold,green.bold" "cd server && yarn build" "cd client && yarn build"
scripts.prod: concurrently -n " server , client " -c "yellow.bold,green.bold" "cd server && yarn start" "cd client && yarn build && yarn start"
scripts.install: concurrently -n " server , client " -c "yellow.bold,green.bold" "cd server && yarn" "cd client && yarn"
scripts.deploy:server: git subtree push --prefix server heroku master
